en.in_development: This feature is under development, follow the news in order to find out when the team will work!

help_command.all: ğŸ¨ | Help Are you so pathetic that you're asking me for help?) Pfff... Well okay. /help - A plea for help from a higher mind. /start - Start the bot / main menu /profile - Open the user profile. /add_me - Send a message with an active add to friends button. (group only) /promo (code) - Enter a promo code.
help_command.dev:
/stats - statistics for the bot.

/add_item item_id col user_id - add an item to the user.

/dungeon_delete - delete your dungeon.

/stats_100 - set charracteristics to all your dinosaurs by 100.

/link_promo (code) - link a button with a promo code to a message from the channel. (a response to the message is required)

/unlink_promo - remove the button (a response to the message is required)

/create_promo col | inf time | inf money - create a promo code.

id of the user

Time: 1m / 2h / 3d / inf
Coins: Number
create_promo.enter_items: Enter items separated by a space or "-"

project_reb.text:
A man in a black robe approaches you.

You can see that the man has black hair and some kind of scar on his cheek, but his eyes are not visible in the shadow of the hat.

*Personality:* - Hello, my name is {random1} {random2}, and you...

*You are:* - ... {first_name}, {user.first_name} {last_name}, that's my name

*Personality:* - Fine {first_name}, how long have you been in our business? _smiling_

*You are:* - ...What? Business? What are you talking about?!

*Personality:* - I see, I see... So we'll write it down. _ Writes something in notepad_

*You are:* - ...

*Personality:* - Let's get down to business, we offer you to sign a contract with us, we get your coins and resources, you get an egg with a dinosaur.

*You:* - I know, I don't know...

*You:* -
